data.prayer: Father, please send new teachers into the harvest, who can correct the lies of our enemy in the state of Rostov, Russia.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Rostov, Russia
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Father, send out evangelists who will challenge people like Peter who said, "Repent and be baptized, every one of you" in the state of Rostov, Russia.
data.verse: Peter replied, “Repent and be baptized, every one of you, in the name of Jesus Christ for the forgiveness of your sins. And you will receive the gift of the Holy Spirit.

data.prayer: Father, set on fire the hearts and passion of your church in the state of Rostov.
data.verse: Do not be slothful in zeal, be fervent in spirit, serve the Lord.

data.prayer: Jesus, please find the broken hearted among the 4,397,300 souls in Rostov and mend their wounds.
data.verse: He heals the brokenhearted and binds up their wounds.

data.prayer: Lord, Let your Kingdom come among the Turk people. Let your will be done, as in heaven, so on earth.
Jesus, remind the disciples in the state of Rostov to train each other to obey all that you commanded, and that you will be with them as they do it.
data.verse: and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age."

data.prayer: Father, multiply brothers, sisters, and mothers to our spiritual family in Rostov, Russia.
data.verse: He replied to him, “Who is my mother, and who are my brothers?” Pointing to his disciples, he said, “Here are my mother and my brothers. For whoever does the will of my Father in heaven is my brother and sister and mother.”

data.prayer: Spirit, how will they hear without a preacher? How will they preach unless they have a Bible? Please give the people in the state of Rostov access to a Bible in their own language.
data.verse: How, then, can they call on the one they have not believed in? And how can they believe in the one of whom they have not heard? And how can they hear without someone preaching to them? And how can anyone preach unless they are sent? As it is written: “How beautiful are the feet of those who bring good news!”
